# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(BATL_database)

ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(BATL)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
BATLPluginInfo.C
BATLCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
BATLPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
BATLMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtBATLFileFormat.C
avtBATLOptions.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
BATLEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtBATLFileFormat.C
avtBATLOptions.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${HDF5_INCLUDE_DIR}
${VISIT_DATABASE_INCLUDES}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${HDF5_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IBATLDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IBATLDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IBATLDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MBATLDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MBATLDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser ${HDF5_LIB} )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MBATLDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MBATLDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EBATLDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EBATLDatabase_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtdatabase_ser ${HDF5_LIB} )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EBATLDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EBATLDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EBATLDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EBATLDatabase_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtdatabase_par ${HDF5_LIB} )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EBATLDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EBATLDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_OUTPUT_DIR(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases BATL ${INSTALLTARGETS})
